title: France rail strikes put local restaurants on the line
text:
France rail strikes put local restaurants on the line 10:19pm IST - 01:51 
Rolling two-day strikes at the French state railway company have paralysed the network on and off for two weeks and are already starting to have an effect on French businesses. As David Pollard reports, restaurants and hotels are particularly affected.
